mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_PWD FROM STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{ studentId }
SELECT PROF_PWD FROM PROFESSOR WHERE PROF_ID = #{ professorId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT ( STUDENT_NO, DEPT_CODE, STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_PWD, STUDENT_NAME, ADDRESS, STUDENT_TELNO, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_STUDENT_NO.NEXTVAL, NULL, #{ studentId }, #{ studentPwd }, #{ studentName }, NULL, #{ studentTelNo }, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT A.DEPT_CODE, A.LECTURE_NO, A.PROF_NO, B.PROF_NAME, A.LECTURE_NAME, A.CREDIT, A.CURR_NO, A.FULL_NO, A.DAY, A.TIME FROM LECTURE A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_NO = B.PROF_NO ORDER BY LECTURE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENROLLMENT VALUES ( SEQ_ENROLL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ studentNo }, #{ lectureNo } )
mapper.select: SELECT B.DEPT_CODE, B.LECTURE_NO, B.PROF_NO, C.PROF_NAME, B.LECTURE_NAME, B.CREDIT, B.CURR_NO, B.FULL_NO, B.DAY, B.TIME FROM ENROLLMENT A JOIN LECTURE B ON A.LECTURE_NO = B.LECTURE_NO JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_NO = C.PROF_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND STUDENT_NO = #{ studentNo } ORDER BY LECTURE_NO
SELECT A.STUDENT_NO, A.LECTURE_NO, A.DAY, A.FIRST_CLASS, A.SECOND_CLASS FROM V_ENROLLMENT_LECTURE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.STUDENT_NO = #{ studentNo }
SELECT LECTURE_NAME, PROF_NAME, STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE, MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK WHERE STUDENT_NO = #{ studentNo }
SELECT GRADE_NO, LECTURE_NO, PROF_NO, STUDENT_NO, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE, MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE FROM GRADE WHERE PROF_NO = #{ profNo } AND LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo }

SELECT A.DEPT_CODE, A.LECTURE_NO, A.PROF_NO, B.PROF_NAME, A.LECTURE_NAME, A.CREDIT, A.CURR_NO, A.FULL_NO, A.DAY, A.TIME FROM LECTURE A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_NO = B.PROF_NO WHERE A.PROF_NO = #{ profNo }
SELECT A.LECTURE_NO, A.STUDENT_NO FROM ENROLLMENT A JOIN LECTURE B ON A.LECTURE_NO = B.LECTURE_NO WHERE B.LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo } AND B.PROF_NO = #{ profNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRADE ( GRADE_NO, LECTURE_NO, PROF_NO, STUDENT_NO, ATT_SCORE, ASS_SCORE, MID_SCORE, FIN_SCORE, GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GRADE_NO, #{ lectureNo }, #{ profNo }, #{ studentNo }, #{ attScore }, #{ assScore }, #{ midScore }, #{ finScore }, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE GRADE A SET A.GRADE = (SELECT CASE WHEN B.ATT_SCORE < 7 THEN 'F' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.05 THEN 'A+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.1 THEN 'A' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.15 THEN 'B+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.2 THEN 'B' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.25 THEN 'C+' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.3 THEN 'C' WHEN RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOT_SCORE DESC) <= #{ currNo } * 0.35 THEN 'D+' ELSE 'D' END; FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK B WHERE A.STUDENT_NO = B.STUDENT_NO) WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 0 FROM VIEW_GRADE_CHECK B WHERE A.STUDENT_NO = B.STUDENT_NO) AND A.LECTURE_NO = #{ lectureNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRADE ( JUDGEMENT_NO, LECTURE_NO, STUDENT_NO, PROF_NO, STU_JUG_SCORE, STU_ONE_JUG ) VALUES ( SEQ_GRADE_NO, #{ judgementNo }, #{ lectureNo }, #{ studentNo }, #{ profNo }, #{ StuJugScore }, #{ StuOneJug }, DEFAULT
